Ninja_Vanish.help: When Pendragon reaches 100 Rage, he taps into the power of the Fae realm, granting him protection from damage and empowering his sword with Mystic energies. Note that Ninja Vanish is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Surveillance.help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Note that Surveillance is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}, tagging them with a remote transponder!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName}, tagging you with a remote transponder!

Snap_Shot.help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Aimed_Shot.help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Fistful_of_Arrows.help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Blazing_Arrow.help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing them to catch on fire and burn. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Explosive_Arrow.help: You fire a grenade-tipped arrow at long range. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Kuji-In_Retsu.help: Chimera's years of training and genetic modification allow him to move faster than the speed of perception for short bursts of time.

Master_Shot.help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Note that Master Shot is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
